Approximately Equivariant QCNN under p4m Group Symmetries for Images

dataset module

Load Classical image datasets. Ising, MNIST, FashionMNIST, EMNIST, EuroSAT, Semeion dataset implemented.

dataset.get_data(data: str, load_dir: str, img_size: int, classes: List[int] | Array | None = None) → Tuple[Array, ...][source]

Function to load training data.

Parameters:

  • data (str) – Name of the dataset.

  • load_dir (str) – Root directory where the datasets are located.

  • imgs_size (int) – Image size to be loaded.

  • classes (Union[List[int], jnp.ndarray]) – List of integers representing data classes to be loaded. If None, return all classes. Default to None.

Returns:

Tuple of training and test labels. The outputs are ordered as follows:

  • X_train: Training samples of shape (num_train, img_size, img_size, num_channel).

  • Y_train: Training labels of shape (num_train, ).

  • X_test: Test samples of shape (num_test, img_size, img_size, num_channel).

  • Y_train: Test labels of shape (num_test, ).

Return type:

Tuple[jnp.ndarray, …]

dataset.load_ising_data(root: str, L: int) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray][source]

Load the Ising model spin distribution stored in pickle file into the numpy array. The pickle file contains the distribution of spins \(\{s_i\}_i\) in 2 dimensional \(L \times L\) lattice governed by the Hamiltonian :

..math:

H = -sum_{langle i, j rangle} J s_i s_j.

Parameters:

  • root (str) – Root directory where the pickle files for data Ising2D_L{L}_T=All.pkl and for labels Ising2D_L{L}_T=All_labels.pkl are located.

  • L (int) – Lattice dimension for 2D Ising model.

dataset.prepare_ising_data(data: array, labels: array, test_size: float = 0.2) → Tuple[ndarray, ...][source]

Function to prepare 2D Ising model data in such way that it is trainable with neural newtork. Code originally taken from Notebook 12: Identifying Phases in the 2D Ising Model with TensorFlow

Parameters:

  • data (np.array) – Numpy array of Ising spin distribution loaded from Ising2D_L{L}_T=All.pkl

  • labels (np.array) – Numpy array of Ising spin distribution loaded from Ising2D_L{L}_T=All.pkl

  • test_size (float, optional) – The ratio of the test set within the whole dataset. Defaults to 0.2.

Returns:

Tuple of training and test data/labels.

Return type:

Tuple[np.ndarray, …]

dataset.preprocess_jnp(classes: Array, trainloader: DataLoader, testloader: DataLoader) → Tuple[Array, ...][source]

Load Data from PyTorch DataLoader into JAX NumPy Arrays

Parameters:

  • classes (jnp.ndarray) – List of integers representing data classes to be loaded. If None, return all classes.

  • trainloader (torch.utils.data.DataLoader) – Trainset loader.

  • testloader (torch.utils.data.DataLoader) – Testset loader.

Returns:

Tuple of training and test data/labels. The outputs are ordered as follows:

  • X_train: Training samples of shape (num_train, img_size, img_size, num_channel).

  • Y_train: Training labels of shape (num_train, ).

  • X_test: Test samples of shape (num_test, img_size, img_size, num_channel).

  • Y_train: Test labels of shape (num_test, ).

Return type:

Tuple[jnp.ndarray, …]
